mainName: Jungle Adventures, A Real Florida Animal Park

topComments.author: Marco Marzochi
topComments.comment: Pode ser por causa da pandemia, mas achei bem ca√≠do o lugar. 4 estrelas por causa da guia que foi 10.

topComments.author: S Perna
topComments.comment: Finally got a chance to go here and it was amazing. It's not a big park but you can spend a good 3-4 hours and not be bored. The staff was very nice and the tour guide, Trish, was great. Loved the swamp cruise - I forgot I was in Orlando for a few minutes. Hundreds of gators in the swamp, also you can see some other animals like tortoises, python, turtles, Bobcat, parrots etc in the park. If you want to escape the theme park craziness and see real Florida in Orlando, this is a good place.

topComments.author: Zech.Browning.75
topComments.comment: I'm a local photographer always looking for a new places and new things to shoot, sure you can find an alligator just about anywhere but the setting that was at this place with all the moss in the pond was perfect for photos.  Staff is pretty cool gave us a military discount because my wife and I are both veterans and very friendly as well.  Check out my Instagram for more photos. @zech.browning.75

topComments.author: Trent Kelly
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© t√£o radical. Os animais s√£o bem cuidados e todos t√™m bastante espa√ßo para se movimentar livremente. Uma coisa que eu realmente amei (por√©m n√£o pensei em tirar uma foto) √© que o recinto dos lobos √© meio isolado do resto do zool√≥gico. J√° estive em outros zool√≥gicos onde os recintos dos lobos ficam em cal√ßadas movimentadas e os lobos sempre parecem estressados ‚Äã‚Äãdessa forma. √â muito bom ver lobos aqui que realmente n√£o parecem se importar em estar em um zool√≥gico! Eu n√£o peguei o nome do cara que est√° fazendo os tours e exibi√ß√µes de animais, mas ele foi √≥timo. Um cara muito engra√ßado, e ele sabia muito sobre todos os animais. Provavelmente um dos melhores guias tur√≠sticos que j√° tive. Definitivamente 5/5 no geral. V√° aqui, voc√™ vai adorar  (Original) This place is so rad. The animals are well cared for and they all have plenty of space to move around freely. One thing I really loved (didn't think to get a picture of it though) is that the wolf enclosure is kinda secluded from the rest of the zoo. I've been to other zoos where the wolf enclosures are on busy walkways and the wolves always seem stressed that way. It's really nice to see wolves here that actually don't seem to mind being in a zoo! I didn't get the name of the guy doing the tours and animal displays, but he was really great. Very funny guy, and he knew a ton about all the animals. Probably one of the best tour guides I've ever had. Definitely 5/5 overall. Go here, you'll love it

topComments.author: Edward Aboufadel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© leg√≠timo. Autenticidade pantanosa. Dezenas de jacar√©s, urubus e outros animais vivos, e algumas surpresas aqui e ali. Certifique-se de fazer o passeio. Nem um cheirinho de Disney.  (Original) This place is legit.  Swampy authenticity.  Dozens of live alligators, buzzards, and other animals, and a few surprises here and there.  Make sure you do the tour.  Not a whiff of Disney.

topComments.author: Debra Parsons
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um local aconchegante para trazer sua fam√≠lia. Se voc√™ gosta de uma experi√™ncia mais natural na Fl√≥rida, voc√™ vai gostar deste parque. Ele n√£o tem toda a agita√ß√£o e alarde dos parques tem√°ticos maiores. √â um bom layout. Muito f√°cil de navegar e visitar cada atividade dispon√≠vel. As pessoas s√£o muito simp√°ticas e prestativas. Eles fazem o poss√≠vel para garantir que voc√™ tenha uma experi√™ncia agrad√°vel. Eles est√£o praticando todas as precau√ß√µes de seguran√ßa social poss√≠veis para manter voc√™ e os animais seguros.üêä Um aviso justo: o custo para crian√ßas √© um pouco caro. Se voc√™ tiver tempo antes de sua visita, pesquise descontos e descontos em grupos antes de chegar. Pesquise "cupons de aventura na selva" no Google Obrigado por dedicar seu tempo para ler minha an√°liseüòä Tenha um √≥timo dia! üåû  (Original) This is a cozy location to bring your Family. If You enjoy a more Natural Florida experience you will like this park. It doesn't have all the hoopla and fanfare of bigger theme parks. It is a good layout. Pretty easy to navigate and visit each activity available. The people are very nice helpful. They do as much as possible  to ensure You have a Pleasant Experience. They are practicing all social safety precautions as possible to keep you and the animals safe.üêä A fair warning: the cost for children is a bit pricey. If you have time before your visit, search for discounts and groupon savings before you arrive. Just google 'Jungle Adventure Coupons' Thank You for taking Your time to read my reviewüòä Have a Great Day!üåû

topComments.author: Jason Washam
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Minha esposa nasceu e cresceu aqui em FL. Nunca t√≠nhamos ouvido falar desse lugar. Demos uma chance e estamos felizes por termos feito. Isso bate o inferno fora do zool√≥gico. Se voc√™ quiser saber sobre a vida selvagem da Fl√≥rida e ter um pouco de m√£os, visite este lugar. A equipe foi √≥tima!!  (Original) My wife was born and raised here in FL. We had never heard of this place. We took a chance and we are glad we did. This beats the hell out of the zoo. If you want to know about Florida wildlife and get a little hands on then visit this place. The staff were so great!!
